checkConfig.description: Check the configuration file for errors.

checkStyles.description: Run stylelint on all CSS-in-JS styled-components and css/sass files

eslintConfig.description: The name of the ESLint configuration file.

lintFilePatterns.description: One or more files/dirs/globs to pass directly to ESLint's `lintFiles()` method.

fix.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

cacheLocation.description: Path to the cache file or directory.

maxWarnings.description: Number of warnings to trigger nonzero exit code - default: `-1`.

hasTypeAwareRules.description: When set to `true`, the linter will invalidate its cache when any of its dependencies changes.

cacheStrategy.description: Strategy to use for detecting changed files in the cache.

rulesdir.description: The equivalent of the `--rulesdir` flag on the ESLint CLI.

resolvePluginsRelativeTo.description: The equivalent of the `--resolve-plugins-relative-to` flag on the ESLint CLI.
